core.constant module

core.dice module

class core.dice.Dice(faces=20)[source]

Bases: object

get_faces()[source]

Return the current number of faces.

Returns:

int: the value stored in the attribute faces.

roll()[source]

Generate a random value between a min value and the actual number of faces.

Returns:

int: the generated number.

set_faces(faces)[source]

Set the number of faces for the dice.

Args:

faces (int): number of faces for the dice. It must be a value between the MIN_DICE_VALUE and MAX_DICE_FACES constants

core.exceptions module

exception core.exceptions.DiceFacesTypeError[source]

Bases: Exception

Raised when the user want to define a dice with an invalid type of faces

exception core.exceptions.DiceFacesValueError[source]

Bases: Exception

Raised when the user want to define a dice with an invalid number of faces
